== Maniyat (CT) (627172) ==

Maniyat (CT) is a town in the [[Hosdurg]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 2.83 sq. km. and harbouring 1113 households with total population of 4683 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 57 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 574 km. Male population is 2174 and female population is 2509. Scheduled Caste population is 56 and Scheduled Tribes population is 18. Census Location Code of the town is 627172<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class VI (population_total < 5,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 17 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 142 km. Railway station is at Chandera at a distance of 2 km.
